summary: AIR CONDITIONER STARTED BLOWING HOT AIR IN NOVEMBER/DECEMBER 2016 AT OR AROUND 50K MILES. IN JUNE 2017, PAID A GMC DEALERSHIP TO DIAGNOSE THE VEHICLE. RESULTS SHOW A CONDENSER LEAK.. CONTACTED GM CUSTOMER CARE DEPT. (SPOKE TO BETH). BETH CONFIRMED THE DIAGNOSIS, INFORMED ME OF THE BACKORDER, THEN INFORMED ME THAT GM WOULD NOT PROVIDE COST ASSISTANCE FOR THE REPAIRS.
